svg:svg.svg:desc: Lighted House scripted to turn the lights on/off when clicking anywhere on the house. scripting can be removed and the lightson fill color changed as desired. From the book, I Love to Color, Play, & Learn, by Jay Nick. I Love to Color, Play, & Learn is as an eBook from cattocreations.com Written by Jay Nick Handcoding SVG since 2001 Author of eBook, Learn SVG Interactively, published by Catto Creations, LLC http://www.jaynick.com I Love to Color, Play, & Learn is published by Catto Creations, LLC Catto Creations mission is Family, Literacy, and Enrichment Visit http://www.cattocreations.com for award winning children's eBooks I Love to Color, Play, & Learn and other free ePub3 eBooks at http://www.cattocreations.com/ePub3.html

ns2:Work.dc:title: Lighted House
ns2:Work.dc:description: From the eBook, I Love to Color, Play, and Learn. Script turns the lights on/off when clicking on the SVG image. SVG code can be inserted into an SVG image then scaled and positioned where desired.
